In England, in the seven days to 21 April, there were 121,481 new confirmed cases (214.8 new cases per 100,000). In the seven days to 14 April, there were 180,417 new cases, and so the new cases have decreased by 33% (58,936 fewer cases). The number of confirmed COVID-19 cases in England so far as at 26 April is 18,489,342 (32,695.5 cases per 100,000 population).
